story_zako_battle_24_02/3701_0101_0100_1:
Heh heh heh. All these Pokémon you brought out
are totally rad!
story_zako_battle_24_02/3701_0101_0200_1:
They’ll be perfect for a rad Trainer like
yours truly!
story_zako_battle_24_02/3701_0101_0300_1: You guys think so, too, right?!
story_zako_battle_24_02/3701_0501_0100_1:
Osu!
You were indeed the most rad!
Please! Allow me to call you master!
story_zako_battle_24_02/3701_0501_0200_1:
Yeah, yer the real deal!
I got your back, too!
story_zako_battle_24_02/3801_0101_0100_1:
Take every Pokémon in sight!
Don’t leave a single one behind!
story_zako_battle_24_02/3801_0101_0300_1:
I know! I’ll steal yer Pokémon so you can’t even
fight in the PML!
story_zako_battle_24_02/3801_0501_0100_1:
Tch... Looks like we can’t even beat you
with numbers.
story_zako_battle_24_02/3801_0501_0200_1:
Whatever. It’s fine as long as we can mess with
the PML!
story_zako_battle_24_02/3801_0501_0300_1:
My crew probably stole way more Pokémon while
I was distracting you here!
